title: Can I switch back to the old client? New one slows my computer down.
body: I was wondering if I could switch back to old client. The new client although cool is just slowing my computer down. I just wanna play league, if I can't because your forcing me to use the new client that's dumb.

replies.body: I just wanna use old client tbh

Yes, you can freely switch back by either using the button at the bottom of the login screen as shown below, or by launching the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
Yea RIot is forcing you to use the New client with lags for 50% of the players or use the old which will take you more time to launch and u cant get connected into PVP.net. Well done riot.
